profile.name: Mike Rodriguez
profile.executiveSummary: Hands-on engineering leader with 12 years building distributed systems at scale. Led teams of 8-15 engineers through complex migrations, system redesigns, and rapid growth phases. Deep expertise in cloud architecture, microservices, and building high-performance engineering cultures. Shipped products serving 10M+ users.

evidence.description: Architected and implemented microservices platform handling 50K requests/sec
evidence.outcome: 99.99% uptime, reduced infrastructure costs 35% through efficient design

evidence.description: Diagnosed performance bottleneck in legacy monolith causing 5-second page loads
evidence.outcome: Reduced p95 latency to 200ms through database optimization and caching strategy

evidence.description: Led investigation of data inconsistency affecting 2% of transactions
evidence.outcome: Root caused race condition, implemented fix, recovered $500K in lost revenue

evidence.description: Evaluated build vs buy decision for authentication system
evidence.outcome: Chose Auth0 integration, saved 6 months dev time and $400K in opportunity cost

evidence.description: Designed event-driven architecture for real-time data pipeline
evidence.outcome: Scaled from 10K to 2M events/day with zero downtime migrations

evidence.description: Made call to delay feature launch due to performance concerns
evidence.outcome: Avoided production incident, shipped 2 weeks later with 10x better performance

evidence.description: Developed internal training program on distributed systems fundamentals
evidence.outcome: Upskilled 35 engineers, reduced architecture review bottlenecks 60%

evidence.description: Built and scaled engineering team from 3 to 15 while maintaining velocity
evidence.outcome: Zero regrettable attrition, 3 engineers promoted to senior, 2 to staff

evidence.description: Implemented code review standards and automated testing requirements
evidence.outcome: Reduced production bugs 75%, improved deployment confidence

evidence.description: Self-taught Kubernetes and cloud-native patterns to lead infrastructure modernization
evidence.outcome: Successfully migrated 40 services to k8s, became internal subject matter expert

purpose: Build systems and teams that deliver reliable, scalable solutions to hard problems.
